answers.answer: HI!I don't know a lot about HCG for weight loss.  I don't see how it would work, unless it makes you nauseated as with pregnancy.  There is a lot of hype about it on the net.  Gastric bypass really does work well, and I have taken care of several women who conceived naturally after surgery--their periods spontaneously resumed after weight loss.Its definitely something to consider!Good luck!Dr B

question: Is HCG really a safe wt loss method for women who suffer from PCOS?  I am 26 and trying to lose wt so I can try to successfully get pregnant, but I currently weigh 273 lbs, have diagnosed PCOS, HTN, Anxiety, Depression, and Diabetes runs strongly in my family....help I'm desperate to lose wt and get taken off of soo many meds
title: PCOS & HCG inj
